item.title: DAMON and BABY – PC Gaming Show 2025: Most Wanted trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

New footage of upcoming action RPG.

Arc System Works has released a new trailer for action adventure game DAMON and BABY as part of today’s PC Gaming Show 2025: Most Wanted.

Here is an overview of the game, via Arc System Works:

About

An unlikely pair, an unforgettable journey.

An exciting new style of action adventure fusing shooting action with exploration.

A New Take on Shooting Action and In-Depth Exploration

Experience a new type of action advent, featuring a fusion between exploration within an expansive world and highly technical twin-stick shooting. At your home base, power up the demon king Damon and make purchases. During the exploration phase, defeat enemies to complete each area. The story progresses as you alternate between the two phases.

Strategic Battles With a Vast Arsenal of Weapons and Gimmicks

The battle mechanics include both close-ranged attacks with handguns as well as long-ranged attacks with machine guns and more.

You can find more powerful weapons as you explore.

During the boss battles awaiting within each stage, a strategic approach making use of the area gimmicks will prove crucial.

Customization and Outfit Changes

Damon grows throughout the adventure, learning to master various weapons and skills. You can customize your set of skills to match your play style. You can even choose from a variety of outfit options to change Damon’s appearance.

Journey Together with Two-Player Cooperative Play

Take control of Damon’s canine companion to help him in combat in various ways, such as collecting items.

*Only available via local (offline) play.

DAMON and BABY is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam in early 2026.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Fullbright announces narrative exploration game Springs, Eternal for PC
item.content:encoded:
Fullbright has announced Springs, Eternal, a lo-fi first-person narrative exploration game set in a mysterious hot springs in the dead of night. It is a two-to-three-hours experience, and will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Fullbright:

About

Springs, Eternal is a lo-fi first-person story exploration game that takes place at a mysterious hot springs in the dead of night, its evocative visual style recalling the dithered and pixelated graphics of late ’90s-era PC and home console games. Immerse yourself in this eerie, half-remembered otherworld, its dark, winding paths at once inviting and unsettling. Meet the other lost souls who have been drawn to this place. Relive your memories of the romantic relationship that brought you here.

Lose yourself. Seek something else.

Key Features

  • A short, focused, supernatural-inflected first-person narrative exploration game (around two-to-three hours to fully complete.) The dark paths you walk are ominous, but you can’t die… can you?
  • Experience all that a mysterious, secluded hot springs retreat has to offer. Multiple tucked-away pools, caverns, and other odd attractions. The map gradually expands as you explore, revealing new discoveries.
  • Over a dozen unique characters to encounter. Talk with them face-to-face, exploring topics via branching dialogue. Learn their stories and how they relate to your own.
  • Delve into a series of memories reliving the romantic relationship that brought you to this point. Flashbacks create a portrait of two people, their life together, and who they’ll become.
  • Evocative lo-fi graphics express the essence of this place through shimmering pixels and dithered fog.
  • Criss-cross the paths of Stillwater Springs using what you learn in one conversation to unlock new dialogue threads and new guest interactions elsewhere. Use your powers of observation to unearth all that Springs, Eternal has in store.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Starsand Island ‘Advanced Gameplay and High-Level Island Mastery’ trailer, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

A look at the game's combat and multiplayer features.

Seed Lab has released a new trailer for anime-inspired life simulation game Starsand Island, as well as new information about the game’s combat and multiplayer features.

Here are the details:

Revealed during today’s PC Gaming Show, in addition to the calm, tranquil farming and friendship building showcased to date, Starsand Island will feature third-person combat mechanics when players explore the island’s mystical, ruined area. As players encounter the many strange animals that live among the ruins, they’ll use a range of weapons, including slingshots and bows, to remove a magical corruption from the creatures, enabling them to be domesticated.

Powerful animal bosses also live among the ruins, presenting a further layer of challenge. Overcoming them will take skill to exploit the creatures’ weaknesses, upgrade weapons and ammo, and perfectly time counters, but with the promise of greater rewards – including unlocking advanced professions to master—it’s a risk worth taking!

  • ❮
  • ❯

Exploring the ruins and battling its strange inhabitants doesn’t have to be a solo experience; like the rest of Starsand Island life, it can also be enjoyed online with a friend, as part of the game’s multiplayer. Players will also be able to invite friends to help build their idyllic, pastoral life, as they plant and harvest crops, fish and master animal husbandry, and construct a perfect home. They can also share vehicles or ride the larger animals, and adventure across the length and breadth of the island.

Today’s reveal also highlighted a number of advanced features available to players on their journey to exploring the simple life: The addition of smart robots will help automate farming, ensuring the harvest is reaped while players are away from their homestead—perhaps on a futuristic hoverboard—while custom glasshouses built in DIY mode will harness the sun’s energy to further help with plant propagation.

Starsand Island is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam, and Microsoft Store in early 2026.

Watch the trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Science-fiction puzzle adventure Rivage announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Raw Fury and developer Exnilo Studio have announced science-fiction puzzle adventure game Rivage for PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

In the 25th century, humanity has been forced to expand beyond its solar system. Among the stars, the planet VESTA is discovered, a world that may hold the promise of a new home. To study it, the A.R.E.S. space station is launched into orbit to analyze its potential. But when the station, and the crew, was caught up in a space phenomenon, calamity struck…

You play as Miranda, who awakens alone aboard the station trapped in a strange phenomenon. With clues of the past echoing through the world: an object out of place, a door newly unlocked, a message left behind almost as if the station itself challenges you. To survive, Miranda must rely on her mind, solving intricate puzzles, experimenting with strange objects, and piecing together the truth behind what happened to her crew and the station itself.

As Miranda unravels the mystery, one truth becomes clear: progress always has a cost. Rivage is an atmospheric science-fiction puzzle adventure that blends exploration, logic, and narrative discovery into a deeply beautiful experience, where each step brings you closer to escape.

Key Features

  • Immersive World – Step aboard the A.R.E.S. station, a meticulously detailed, fully interactable environment where every item tells a story. Examine artifacts, analyze research data, and uncover hidden notes scattered across abandoned workstations.
  • Captivating Storytelling – The station was once home to a crew, each with their own goals, fears, and philosophies. Now, only fragments of their lives remain: journals, personal logs, and encrypted messages scattered throughout the station. Piece together their relationships, uncover the emotional toll of isolation, and experience a narrative that weaves scientific mystery with human vulnerability.
  • Unravel the Mystery – Every puzzle in Rivage is woven into the fabric of the story. You’ll repair broken systems, realign malfunctioning mechanisms, and solve environmental challenges that play with gravity, magnetism, and the very flow of time.
  • The K9 System – With the K9 System, Miranda can log discoveries and retain certain puzzle solutions, allowing players to focus on what truly matters; uncovering the truth behind the distortions that have consumed the station. This balance keeps gameplay engaging, rewarding cleverness and persistence over repetition.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Luna Abyss launches in 2026
item.content:encoded:
First-person bullet hell action adventure game Luna Abyss will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2026, publisher Kwalee and developer Kwalee Labs announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Kwalee:

About

You are a prisoner sentenced to explore a derelict megastructure that sprawls deep beneath the surface of the mimic moon Luna. You are tasked with recovering forgotten technology from within the Abyss and the lost colony it consumed. Every move you make will be overseen by your artificial prison guard named Aylin.

These centuries-old ruins are alive with maddening echoes, insinuating secrets of the once prosperous city of Greymont and its terrible fate. The Scourge. The tenets of the All-Father. The choir of the Collective. The voices of the Abyss call to you; they whisper strange missives…

Key Features

  • Welcome to the Abyss – “Don’t be afraid, little wanderer. You need only go deeper, the better to be seen by us. The slumbering silent one breathes deep and waits. All we need is the key. All we need is you.”
  • Buried Mystery – Uncover the mysteries of the mimic moon, and the abyss within its depths. Come face to face with remnants of the colony’s downfall & discover your role within this doomed world. Learn all the secrets the abyss has to offer.
  • Navigate Forsaken Chasms – Sprint, jump, and dash your way through this brutalist alien megastructure. Experience fluid first-person platforming as you travel through Luna and the depths of the abyss.
  • Withstand the Onslaught – Face corrupted souls & twisted cosmic horrors of Luna Abyss with weapon in hand. Master your tools, adjust on the fly and survive in a bullet hell.

Watch a new trailer below.

The Eye Has Opened Trailer

item.title: Retro-style fishing mystery game About Fishing announced for PS5, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

"Made out of love for Shenmue and SEGA Bass Fishing."

Publisher Playstack and Arctic Eggs developer The Water Museum have announced About Fishing, a fishing mystery game “made out of love for Shenmue and SEGA Bass Fishing.” It will be available for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

About Fishing is a fishing mystery game that blends the calm, meditative rhythm of fishing with the quiet tension of discovery. It drifts between serenity and unease, as every catch brings you closer to uncovering what lies beneath.

Key Features

  • Fishing is Everything – Each catch feels distinct, with its own patterns and behaviors waiting to be learned. Cast your line, trade your catch, upgrade your gear and explore new depths.
  • Fishing for Clues – Every cast is a chance to uncover something unexpected. The fish you catch become your guides, helping you reach fragments of a long-forgotten mystery hidden beneath the surface. You can lose yourself in the calm of fishing or follow the clues the water offers.
  • A Place Where You Belong – The world around you moves with time and weather. Fish linger beneath the surface, people follow quiet routines, and the town changes with each passing day. Each person you meet carries their own memories and small joys. Their lives unfold around you, drawing you closer to the peace of a place that slowly begins to feel like home.

Staff

  • About Fishing is developed by Kevin (The Water Museum), creator of Arctic Eggs. Made out of love for Shenmue and SEGA Bass Fishing.
  • Artist: Angel Perez
  • Guzman Composer: Cameron Ginex

Important Disclaimer

No fish were harmed in the making of About Fishing. Can’t say the same for the curly fries.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Wired Productions and LKA announce psychological thriller When Sirens Fall Silent for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

"Violent, emotional, and deeply harrowing."

Publisher Wired Productions and developer LKA have announced When Sirens Fall Silent, a dark, investigative, psychological thriller coming to PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Wired Productions:

About

When Sirens Fall Silent is a dark, investigative, psychological thriller where you play as Mila, a determined policewoman in early 1990s Italy. Haunted by a past she’s desperate to escape, Mila is thrust into a high-profile case of kidnappings and murders. As the investigation unravels, you must not only save her from herself, but also being swallowed up by a vortex of violence, mystery and confusion.

In When Sirens Fall Silent, LKA continues its tradition of perfectly recreating real Italian locations, whilst delivering a haunting and uncomfortable narrative unseen before in video games. The studio has consistently tackled difficult topics head-on and this latest project will not shy away from storytelling that pushes the boundaries of art. There will be no face peeling… this is a different kind of horror.

Both The Town of Light and Martha Is Dead were critically acclaimed and won multiple awards, and When Sirens Fall Silent will reveal deep links and crossovers to previous LKA games, further strengthening writer and creative director Luca Dalco’s credentials as master of shining a light on the forgotten people, continuing the Storie Senza Voce series.

Pushing Unreal Engine 5 to its limits, When Sirens Fall Silent stretches technological boundaries and redefines the expectations of what is possible with a small, but focused team of ten, but also allowed LKA to deliver a new aspect to its games; a branching, multi-layered narrative dialogue system, with a huge focus on verbal and emotional interaction, investigation and subsequent choices; a huge transformation between earlier games.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • From the creators of The Town of Light and Martha Is Dead – The award-winning titles that launched LKA to critical and fan acclaim.
  • Multi-Layered Narrative, Covering Tough Topics – From real world issues of trafficking, to real life attitudes of misogyny, the team pull no punches.. with a few surprises along the way.
  • Investigate – Find and piece together the clues to hunt down the criminal mastermind, from examining bodies to rooms full of potential answers.
  • Interview Key Characters – Engage in detailed dialogues but pay attention to the body language, sometimes there are answers in the unspoken words.
  • Cinematic Look and Feel – Stunning environments and characters, perfectly and authentically recreated for a truly immersive experience.
  • Environmental Puzzles – From the logical to the mind bending, but all to add challenges to your journey.
  • Explore and Re-Explore to Uncover More Clues – Crime scenes often hide clues that aren’t obvious on first examinations… who knows what you might find.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

item.title: 2.5D anime-style adventure game Epoch Reset announced for PC

Publisher Kakehashi Games and developer abnermtj have announced 2.5D anime-style adventure game Epoch Reset. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2027.

Here is an overview of the game, via Kakehashi Games:

About

Unravel a narrative-driven 2.5D anime adventure as Hector, a dirt-poor genius and creator of the world’s first time machine. Travel between timelines, meet intriguing characters, and explore futuristic cityscapes as you seek to save reality from time-bending forces beyond imagination.

Features

  • Travel Through Time and Break the Loop – From the bustling crosswalks of present-day Hong Kong to the back-alleys of 2069 Tokyo, you’ll explore sprawling cityscapes across time as you work to avoid temporal catastrophes.
  • Save Friends and Stop Murders – Meet a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique opinions, desires, and flaws.

item.title: DarkSwitch launches March 12, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Survival city builder dated.

Survival city builder DarkSwitch will launch for PC via Steam and GOG on March 12, 2026, developer Cyber Temple announced. A two-hour prologue demo is now available via Steam.

Here is an overview of the game, via Cyber Temple:

About

At its core, DarkSwitch is a vertical survival city builder set atop a colossal tree, high above the lethal fog that has consumed civilization and threatens the city’s very own existence. While players continue to develop their settlement, story-driven quests, time-sensitive expeditions, and dynamic fog surges can shift entire strategies in a moment.

The main antagonist is an enigmatic fog, which impacts citizens’ health and morale, and is modeled using custom voxel grid technology, creating dynamic and unpredictable fog shifts. A once-thriving society faced a life-threatening enemy when this mysterious mist swept across the lands, warping their minds and consuming everything. In a desperate attempt for survival, those who still stood fled upwards towards the treetops, and rebuilt their homes above the deadly haze. The game’s heavy atmosphere is paired with ambisonic audio cues that intensify the sense of dread, all woven together by the haunting compositions of legendary musician Akira Yamaoka.

Key Features

  • Build a variety of buildings—industrial, social, and defensive. Research new technologies and develop specialized machinery to advance your treetop city. Build high, build safe!
  • Manage scarce resources, balance the distribution of raw materials between construction, defense, and the needs of your residents. Distribute wisely!
  • Light up the streets to repel the fog, fortify defenses, and make difficult choices to secure the survival of your city. Save lives, protect souls!
  • Venture into the fog to gather rare resources and uncover ancient artifacts. Lead expeditions to rescue survivors and push the story forward. Understand the Fog, uncover its origins!
  • Develop your city’s leaders and unravel an epic story through quests, objectives, and side missions, all centered around four main protagonists.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Retro-style first-person shooter Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War! announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

From Warhammer 40,000: Bolt Gun developer Auroch Digital.

Publisher Dotemu and Warhammer 40,000: Bolt Gun series developer Auroch Digital have announced Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War!, a retro-style first-person shooter coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Lock and load into the Starship Troopers universe and join the Mobile Infantry in the most realistic depiction of war ever made ! Experience an original story in this action-packed, first-person retro shooter. Would you like to know more?

The United Citizen Federation is calling on YOU to join the fight for humanity.

You’ll witness humanity’s noble efforts to safeguard the galaxy first hand. Wield the diverse and unique Mobile Infantry arsenal to burn, dismember and cripple the Arachnid threat in first-person, high-action warfare through the eyes of Sammy.

The Arachnid menace has spread far from their home planet of Klendathu, invading human territory across the galaxy. Once inspiring colonies of human beauty, ingenuity and collaboration, now lie torn apart by the merciless and unprovoked Bug threat.

Sign up today and protect not just our world, but the future of the human race.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • A Faithful Training Simulation – Recruits like you are vital to the Federation. We expect the best, and we give the best! Our Games and Theory department have been working hard to develop an in-depth training course. Troopers on the path to Citizenship will find a unique experience within Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War!
  • Authentic Retro First-Person Shooter Experience – Lead your squads through epic battlefields in a solo campaign packed with missions, secrets, and (of course) BUGS!
  • Devastating Anti-Bug Arsenal – Wield over 30 iconic weapons and items, from the classic Morita rifle to mechanical bipeds, tactical nukes, and more.
  • Sharply Loyal Story – Experience a unique and original story honoring the Federation’s commitment to save humanity from the Bugs.
  • Video and Audio Starring General Johnny Rico Himself – Witness the legend return in full, high-quality full-motion video and meet new Federation hero, Major Samantha Dietz.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Lunar Strike launches in May 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Science-fiction narrative adventure and exploration game dated.

Science-fiction narrative adventure and exploration game Lunar Strike will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in May 2026, developer Cognition Europe announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Cognition Europe:

About

Lunar Strike is a single-player narrative adventure and exploration game set on the Moon’s South Pole in the year 2119.

You play as a junior archivist sent to document humanity’s final lunar colony. Your mission begins with scanning and preserving scientific, cultural, and personal records.

But when sabotage destabilizes the colony, the task shifts to survival under real lunar conditions: managing oxygen, power, and time while deciding what knowledge and memory must endure. Every choice shapes the archive—and the outcome of the colony itself.

Developed with ethical questions of legacy, memory, and responsibility at its heart, players will face increasingly difficult challenges to build and preserve the archive, with multiple outcomes driven by their decisions and values.

Key Features

  • Rich, Multi-Faceted Narrative – Preserve the culture of the last remaining lunar colony while making game-altering decisions that impact the story, unravelling a new future for humanity.
  • No Combat – Lunar Strike focuses on survival, scanning, puzzle solving, and decision-making. The gameplay unfolds under time pressures, environmental degradation, and mounting ethical tension.
  • Grounded in Hard Science – Developed in collaboration with space researchers, the game incorporates realistic systems and hazards, including 1/6th lunar gravity, toxic Moon dust, and real-world physics.
  • Cultural Heritage as Gameplay – Preserve humanity’s story on the Moon. Through 3D scanning, photogrammetry, and archival logic, capture the final traces of lunar life before its collapse.
  • Rooted in Real Ethics and Science Fiction – Inspired by real-life heritage efforts, built by creators with backgrounds in cultural preservation and storytelling, Lunar Strike invites thoughtful engagement with space exploration.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Cellar Door Games announces roguelike strategy RPG Neath for PC
item.content:encoded:
Rogue Legacy series developer Cellar Door Games has announced roguelike strategy RPG Neath for PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

“With deep inspiration from not only video games like Into the Breach, but also tabletop board games such as Mansions of Madness, Neath is a game we’ve been wanting to make for years,” said Cellar Door Games co-founder and lead programmer Kenny Lee in a press release. “Development has taken us far from our comfort zone, working in an unfamiliar genre with an aesthetic much darker than what we usually do. But we’ve got a lot of new ideas, from ‘engagement locking’ to the ‘attack resolve system’, and we’re excited to see if we can move this burgeoning genre in a whole new direction. PRAISE NEATH!”

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Praise Neath.

Lead a band of fragile warriors through a colossal, inverted tower, where Taboos, the everchanging edicts of a God, warp the laws of reality.

Neath is a roguelike tactical RPG set in a decaying world shadowed by an irradiated, inverted tower. Using a fluid turn-based system where the turn order is always shifting, you dictate the actions of both friend and foe alike. As enemies engage you they will freeze your teammates in fear. Disrupt opponents by knocking them away, shove allies far from impending harm, or make the ultimate sacrifice and have someone else take the blow in their stead.

As you ascend the corrupt citadel to defy the decree of the undivine, your journey will twist and turn with encounters shown through a classic 90’s dungeon-crawler style. Unlock new abilities and challenges that ensure every expedition is unique, and unravel a dark mystery before you succumb to the horrors within.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Control Every “Moment” – A unique “engagement-locking” system grips your teammates in fear when they are targeted by enemies, and you must disrupt your foes to save them. In Neath there are no heroes. Work together to survive, or stand alone and fall.
  • Ascend the Inverted Tower – Face your fears as you ascend the ever-changing inverted tower of Neath in a roguelike tactical RPG where every run is unique.
  • Defy Fate – Make trapped chests fizzle, barter with the gods, and reshape destiny with the power of Fate’s Die. Encounter special events inspired by classic 90’s dungeon-crawlers that reshapes your party during every run. But beware the consequences when playing games with providence.
  • Ever-Changing Encounters – Build your party throughout the run to learn new abilities and uncover ancient, powerful relics. Build esoteric synergies that will have you poisoning the air with rotting stench, or striking blows that send enemies hurtling across the room.
  • Shape Your Settlement – Build up the lowly town of Shale to better prepare you to climb deeper into the depths of the tower. Distribute your serfdom to prioritize skills that adjust your playstyle before every run.
  • Praise Neath – The Taboos must be honoured. The Taboo must be obeyed. Tithe the gods; say their name. Laws may change, but the punishment remains the same. Praise Neath.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.
